definition: the act of officially naming a candidate
details:
noun
- the act of officially naming a candidate
= example: the act of officially naming a candidate
- an address, usually at a political convention, proposing the name of a candidate to run for election
= example: an address, usually at a political convention, proposing the name of a candidate to run for election
= synonyms: nominating speech, nominating address
- the condition of having been proposed as a suitable candidate for appointment or election
= example: the condition of having been proposed as a suitable candidate for appointment or election
